unnormalised: **Brand Collabs Galore! Influencer Marketing Heats Up!**
normalised: **Brand Collaborations Galore! Influencer Marketing Heats Up!**

unnormalised: Social media is buzzing with brand collaborations! It seems like every other day, we're seeing a new partnership popping up. From fashion hauls with Masaba Gupta to travel vlogs featuring destinations like Kerala, brands are going all out with influencer marketing.
normalised: Social media is buzzing with brand collaborations! It seems like every other day, we are seeing a new partnership popping up. From fashion hauls with Masaba Gupta to travel vlogs featuring destinations like Kerala, brands are going all out with influencer marketing.

unnormalised: Remember last week's craze when chef Sanjeev Kapoor teamed up with a rice brand to promote his special Biryani recipe? Traffic went crazy!
normalised: Remember last week's craze when chef Sanjeev Kapoor teamed up with a rice brand to promote his special Biryani recipe? Traffic went crazy!

unnormalised: Analysts are saying that with festivals like Onam approaching, we can expect even more collaborations. Brands want to cash in on that festive cheer, y'know?
normalised: Analysts are saying that with festivals like Onam approaching, we can expect even more collaborations. Brands want to cash in on that festive cheer, you know?

unnormalised: This week, lifestyle influencer, Priya Sharma, is teasing a new collab with a local saree brand in Varanasi. We hear they're aiming for a reach of over 500k views!
normalised: This week, lifestyle influencer, Priya Sharma, is teasing a new collaboration with a local saree brand in Varanasi. We hear they are aiming for a reach of over five hundred thousand views!

unnormalised: But it's not all smooth sailing. Some folks are calling out influencers for not being transparent about sponsored posts. Gotta keep it real, right?
normalised: But it is not all smooth sailing. Some folks are calling out influencers for not being transparent about sponsored posts. Gotta keep it real, right?

unnormalised: Either way, one thing is clear: influencer marketing is here to stay! And expect more desi flavor in your feeds. Namaste!
normalised: Either way, one thing is clear: influencer marketing is here to stay! And expect more desi flavor in your feeds. Namaste!
